meanings.definition: To exceed in value or importance.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness outvalues any material possessions.
meanings.sent2: In a world full of treasures, love outvalues them all.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's cuteness outvalues any mischief it gets into.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of nature outvalues any man-made creation.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children outvalues any riches in the world.

meanings.definition: To be more valuable or important than.
meanings.sent1: His friendship outvalues any amount of money.
meanings.sent2: Family bonds outvalues any disagreements or misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The taste of her homemade cookies outvalues any store-bought treats.
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of experience outvalues any theoretical knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of a hug outvalues any words of comfort.
